name: lucide-static
description: Lucide is a community-run fork of Feather Icons, open for anyone to contribute icons.

scripts.build: pnpm clean && pnpm copy:license && pnpm copy:icons && pnpm copy:tags && pnpm build:lib
scripts.clean: rm -rf lib && rm -rf build && rm -rf icons && rm -f sprite.svg && rm -f tags.json
